data.title: Normal McDonalds experience
data.text: Mcdonalds has made their fame by being consistent no matter where you go.  The food is what you always expect.  A Big Mac in Iowa tastes the same as Minnesota.  My favorite thing is of course the fries.  Had the Sausage, cheese and egg McMuffin with a Coke.  Good place and was busy.

data.title: Good news/ bad news
data.text: The good news is this store is very busy so the food was very fresh. The bad news was the tables were dirty and the ice machine was out of ice.

data.title: Mc Donalds above average local service
data.text: This particular Mc Donald's is above average for this city. The food has always been hot and service has been very good. The other Ronald stores in the area should take lessons.

data.title: McDonald's
data.text: Everyone likes McDonald's don't they??  The food  is always good.  I especially like the bacon, egg, and cheese  McGriddle.  YUM

data.title: Fast and Friendly
data.text: I was greeted with a smile.  My ordered was taken quickly and accurately.  The ice cream was good and the tea was fresh.  Nice job!

data.title: Great food
data.text: Well as always McDonald's is McDonalds then I give this a 5 stars for excellent customer service and a clean room to eat how to clean bathrooms overall just a wonderful experience and the people behind the counter were very friendly everything you expect from McDonald's fulfilled very nice

data.title: Could have been better
data.text:
This was by far one of the worse visits I have witnessed. The staff was unapproachable, no management in sight; the ice cream machine was broken but no one bothered to tell the public about it until AFTER they ordered ice cream; toys in the Happy Meals were broken; and for me, the mens bathroom was filthy(before I got in there). I have been to other McDonalds all over Iowa and the US and have encountered problems like these.
I hope the next time I am in town that these issues are addressed. In my opinion, this experience could have been better.
